name: Case Study: Ivee 3D Editor - Aurelia+Azure+ASP.NET+Redux+ThreeJS
description: Today, I'm pleased to introduce you to Daniel Radu. Dan is a member of our Aurelia community who has been building some pretty awesome stuff by combining Aurelia [http://aurelia.io] with Microsoft Azure [https://azure.microsoft.com]. I'll let Dan tell you about his experiences, in his own words...
